response.overview: Two brothers, Arto and Hayk, sitting in a cafe share interesting stories of the past summer. Most interesting, however, was the Arto's story that was about him and the girl he loved, Eva. He and Eva are school friends, very close. After marking the last call, they each other they go back for a walk in the city, like all other summers. But this was a different day, a day when the minute was enough to remember them old love.
response.title: Masquerade
